title: Marcus Wareing at Christmas
overview: In this festive series, Marcus takes a step back from the pressures of a professional kitchen to reveal the Christmas recipes that give him the most purpose and pleasure - those he cooks for his own friends and family.Across ten episodes, he will be sharing his favourite festive tips and tricks to help create a menu that will see us right through the Christmas holidays. From perfect pastries, impressive party favourites to decadent Christmas puds, Marcus shows us how anyone can create a wonderful Christmas spread.
